dashboard.source: Where did you find this role?
dashboard.has-job-help:
You can keep adding jobs or close this window - everything is saved.
Come back at any time - the to-do will be in your list until you mark it as done.
After that, there'll be an entry in your journal.
dashboard.first-use-help: Add jobs that you're interested in or have applied for.

form.title: Job title
form.sourceType: Where did you find out about this job?
form.rating: How interested are you in this role?

addJob.pageTitle: Add a job - Your work search
addJob.help: Add a job that you're interested in or have applied for. You can come back at any time and edit this information.

introduction.action-overview: Use this tool to help with your work search.
introduction.action-1: Build a list of jobs you're interested in.
introduction.action-2: Update each job when you apply, interview or get a result.
introduction.action-3: Go through the list of jobs with your work coach to get support and advice.
introduction.post-action-overview: You can come back at any time and add more jobs.

missing-account-id.heading: Sign in to your account
missing-account-id.message: Please access this tool through your Universal Credit account.

form.progress: Where are you in the process?
form.rating: How interested are you in this role?
